Complete the tutorial and earn ${amount} Kin
column15: Kin is a new way to get rewarded for your ideas and creativity. In the Kin Marketplace you easily earn Kin by completing quick tasks and spend it on your favorite brands.

column14: Complete the tutorial and earn ${amount} Kin
column15: The Kin Marketplace is the central hub for all things kin. Find all of the latest spend and earn opportunities, keep track of your balance in your very own super secure blockchain wallet.

column14: Complete the tutorial and earn ${amount} Kin
column15: Earning Kin is fast and fun. Just complete quick tasks like answering short surveys, watching a video, or reading a tutorial (like this one) to see your Kin start rolling in.
